scrape.title: The dinner
scrape.author: Elizabeth
scrape.text: I'm probably supposed to find this book provocative or clever, but I mostly found it boring, shallow, cynical, and violent. It's as if the author tried to infuse the maximum amount of unpleasantness into his story. Every glimmer of humanity is tainted by hatred, selfishness, or violence, and it's hard to feel anything for such vaguely drawn yet morally bankrupt characters.
